parameters.subject: Information about your application - Valencia Masters Water Polo Cup 2026
parameters.html:
={{ '

Valencia Masters Water Polo Cup 2026

III Masters Water Polo Tournament

Thanks for signing up

Hey ' + $json["Contact Person Name"] + '!

First off, thanks to you and your team ' + $json["Team Name"] + ' for your interest in joining the Valencia Masters Water Polo Cup 2026.

This year we received way more applications than we can host, so we had to do a random draw among all interested teams to decide who gets to play this edition.

Unfortunately, this time you did not make it. We know it is a bummer, but we would really love to see you in future editions!

See you next year!

Stay tuned to our socials and sign up again for the next edition. We would be super happy to have you!

Thanks again for your interest. Hope to see you in Valencia soon!

Cheers,
The Valencia Masters Water Polo Cup Team

Valencia Masters Water Polo Cup 2026

info@valenciamasterswaterpolo.com
